data.scheme_name: Mukhyamantri Mahila Utkarsh Yojana 2022 - Interest Free Loan - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provide interest free loans of up to Rs. 1 lakh.
data.eligibility:
Applicant should be a woman who is a permanent resident of Gujarat.
The applicant should have passed at least the 8th standard.
data.conditions: Women willing to get credit will have to form a "Joint Liability Earning and Saving Group (LEGS) of 10 woman's.
data.beneficiaries:
Applicants should be a woman who is permanent resident of Gujarat.
Applicants Should be 18 years of age or above.
The applicants should have passed at least 8th standard.
data.prerequisites:
• Women's willing to get credit will have to form a "Joint Liability Earning and Saving Group (JLESG) of 10 woman's. 
  • All woman's of the group should be between 18 and 59 years of age. Only one female member of the family can be taken in group. 
  • But if such in such a family the daughter-in-law of that family lives together in a joint family, they may became the member of the group. 
  • Team members should be lived in a same area or work in a same area. The Joint Liability Group havening no outstanding loan under any previous scheme can apply for this scheme. 
  • A joint account has to be opened for this group and each member of the group has to deposit Rs300 in his team saving account once.
data.nodal_agency:
Gujarat Urban Livelihood Mission (G.L.L.M)
Gujarat Urban Promotion Company (G.L.P.C)
data.context: Mukhyamantri Mahila Utkarsh Yojana (MMUY) is a government scheme that provides financial assistance to women to economically empower them and provide them self-employment opportunities. Under the scheme, women are given interest free loans up to Rs 1 lakh. Loan can be used by women to start any business or expand existing business.
data.objective:
To promote women's entrepreneurship and provide them with financial assistance to start or expand their businesses.
To provide interest-free loans to women entrepreneurs to promote their business ventures.
data.description:
1. Interest-Free Loans: Women entrepreneurs can avail of interest-free loans of up to Rs. 1 lakh to start or expand their businesses. 
  2. The loans are provided without any collateral security. 
  3. No Processing Fee: The scheme does not charge any processing fee for the loan application. 
  4. Repayment Period: The repayment period for the loan is up to 5 years, giving entrepreneurs sufficient time to repay the loan. 
  5. Per beneficiary group interest subsidy up to Rs.6000. Waiver of stamp duty required for bank loan.
data.how_to_apply:
Visit the official website of the scheme  https://mmuy.gujarat.gov.in/.
Download the application form from the website or obtain it from the nearest Gujarat Women's Economic Development Corporation (GWEDC) office.
Fill in the application form with all the necessary details, including personal and business-related information..
Submit the Application Form.
data.funding_mechanism: After verifying the loan application submitted by the group and verifying the details of the members the credit institution will decide to sanction a loan.
data.additional_info:
The entire team will be responsible for repaying the loan. All the members have to pay equally.
Repayment of Rs1 lakh loan per group will be repaid in 12 monthly instalments. If regular monthly instalments are paid, two monthly instalments of Rs 10000 in 11th nd 12th months will be saved in joint account.
data.checklist_info_a:
The applicant should have a valid Aadhaar card.
Any government-issued identity proof such as Voter ID, Driving License, or PAN Card.
Any government-issued address proof such as Voter ID, Driving License, or Passport.
The applicant should provide a certificate of having passed at least 8th standard.
The applicant should submit a detailed business plan, including the type of business, the investment required, and expected revenue.
The applicant should provide the bank account details for the loan disbursement.
Recent passport-size photographs of the applicant.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: Block No. 9, 8th Floor, New Sachivalaya, Gandhinagar.
Phone: 079-232-57942
Email ID: ps2sec1-wcd@gujarat.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Gujarat - All MSMEs and Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
